exception.permission.edit: 不允許編輯超過%s的方塊
exception.permission.place.color: 沒有權限放置透明度低於%s的方塊
exception.permission.density: Only %s tiles are allowed in block
exception.door.notloaded: 無法與門互動（並非所有瓷磚都已載入）
exception.door.brokenparent: 無法與門互動（與父組的連結已斷開）
exception.door.brokenchild: 不能與門互動（與子級的連結已斷開）
placement.mode.default.tooltip: 只有在目標區域中的所有方塊都有空間時才能放置
placement.mode.fill.tooltip: 如果方塊不存在，會嘗試填充方塊
placement.mode.all.tooltip: 只有在所有方塊都有空間的情況下才能放置
placement.mode.overwrite.tooltip: 將放置所有方塊並移除重疊部分，不會移除結構方塊
placement.mode.overwriteall.tooltip: Will place all tiles and remove the entire block.\nCannot remove structure tiles.
placement.mode.replace.tooltip: 只會將方塊放在重疊的部分，不會移除結構方塊。
placement.mode.stencil.tooltip: Will remove all tiles at the overlapping space.\nDoes not place anything.
placement.mode.colorize.tooltip: Will color all tiles at the overlapping space.\nDoes not place anything.
commands.open.usage: 在給定坐標處打開所有門
commands.open.tovanilla: Convert all loaded tileentites to vanilla blocks if possible

config.littletiles.building.invertStickT: Whether tiles should stick to the vanilla grid when second mode is enabled or disabled.
config.littletiles.building.maxSavedActi: Number of actions which can be reverted.
config.littletiles.building.useALTForEve: Second mode will be activated if 'ALT' is pressed (default: sneaking).
config.littletiles.building.useAltWhenFl: Press 'ALT' when flying instead of sneaking to activate second mode.
config.littletiles.rendering.hideParticl: Whether the particle block is visible or not
config.littletiles.rendering.renderingTh: 渲染方塊時使用的線程數量
config.littletiles.rendering.highlightSt: Whether a tile of structure should render its own selection box or that of the entire structure
config.littletiles.rendering.previewLine: When set to true lines will be used to render the preview
config.littletiles.rendering.enableRando: 啟用時，在 LittleTiles 中使用的沙、砂礫和紅石礦會有粒子效果（也可相容其他模組）
config.littletiles.rendering.useQuadCach: 顯著地增加了記憶體（RAM）的占用，但可減少渲染所需的時間。僅在「useCubeCache」啟用時有效。（需要重新載入存檔）
config.littletiles.rendering.useCubeCach: 顯著地增加了記憶體（RAM）的占用，但可減少渲染所需的時間。（需要重新載入存檔）
config.littletiles.rendering.uploadToVBO: Used to smooth out placement of doors
config.littletiles.general.allowFlowingW: If disabled the bucket cannot be used to change the water flow.
config.littletiles.general.allowFlowingL: If disabled the bucket cannot be used to change the lava flow.
config.littletiles.general.storagePerPix: Each pixel in default grid makes space for one itemstack (stacksize of one).\n64 pixel add up to one slot
config.littletiles.general.enableBed.com: 是否允許玩家在使用 LittleTiles 製作的床上睡覺。
config.littletiles.general.enableAnimati: 顯示過渡動畫時能否推動實體（啟用後對效能有影響）
config.littletiles.general.enableCollisi: Motion is applied to an entity when its moved by an animation
config.littletiles.survival.limitAffecte: Whether the amount of converting vanilla blocks should limited.
config.littletiles.survival.maxAffectedB: Maximum amount of vanilla blocks which can be converted at once.
config.littletiles.survival.limitEditBlo: If the amount a player can destroy or paint at once should be limited in survival.
config.littletiles.survival.maxEditBlock: Only affects the range if edit/remove limitation is enabled.
config.littletiles.survival.harvestLevel: 0: 任意, 1: 石製, 2: 鐵製, 3: 鑽石.
config.littletiles.survival.editUnbreaka: 能否在生存模式下編輯不能被破壞的方塊（例如基岩）。
config.littletiles.survival.limitPlaceBl: If the amount a player can place at once should be limited in survival.
config.littletiles.survival.maxPlaceBloc: 僅當啟用「放置限制」（Place Limitation）時有效。
config.littletiles.survival.minimumTrans: Transparency will be enabled if the minimum is smaller than 255.
config.littletiles.survival.dyeVolume.co: How many blocks can painted with one dye\nassuming the tile has the exact same color
config.littletiles.creative.limitAffecte: Whether the amount of converting vanilla blocks should limited.
config.littletiles.creative.maxAffectedB: Maximum amount of vanilla blocks which can be converted at once.
config.littletiles.creative.limitEditBlo: If the amount a player can destroy or paint at once should be limited in survival.
config.littletiles.creative.maxEditBlock: Only affects the range if edit/remove limitation is enabled.
config.littletiles.creative.harvestLevel: 0: 任意, 1: 石製, 2: 鐵製, 3: 鑽石.
config.littletiles.creative.editUnbreaka: If you can edit an unbreakable block (bedrock) in survival.
config.littletiles.creative.limitPlaceBl: If the amount a player can place at once should be limited in survival.
config.littletiles.creative.maxPlaceBloc: Only affects the range if place limitation is enabled.
config.littletiles.creative.minimumTrans: Transparency will be enabled if the minimum is smaller than 255.
config.littletiles.creative.dyeVolume.co: How many blocks can painted with one dye\nassuming the tile has the exact same color
littletiles.chisel.tooltip:
%s
'%s' to pick block
Hold 'CTRL' to place more points
'%s' to mark the position
'%s' to configure tool
'%s' to configure grid size
littletiles.grabber.tooltip: %s\n'%s' to configure tool\n'%s' to configure grid size
littletiles.hammer.tooltip:
%s
Hold 'CTRL' to place more points
'%s' to mark the position
'%s' to configure tool
'%s' to configure grid size and filter
littletiles.colortube.tooltip:
%s
'%s' to pick color
Hold 'CTRL' to place more points
'%s' to mark the position
'%s' to configure tool
'%s' to configure grid size and filter
littletiles.recipeadvanced.tooltip:
'%s' first position
'%s' second position
'%s' pick shape/ structure
'%s' confirm/ configure selection
littletiles.saw.tooltip: '%s' extend tile\n'%s' shrink tile\nHold 'CTRL' to go further
littletiles.screwdriver.tooltip: '%s' first position\n'%s' second position\n'%s' modify selection
exception.permission.recipe.size: Recipe area is too large (maximum %s blocks allowed)
